scripts.static: cp -R static/ build/static && cp robots.txt build/ && cp sitemap.xml build/
scripts.html-minify: html-minifier --file-ext html -o build/index.html --collapse-boolean-attributes --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true index.html
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run css-minify && pnpm run static && pnpm run html-minify
